body.name: Coohea Mini Handheld Fan 4800mAh Battery Portable Fan USB Rechargeable Eyelash Fan 3 Speeds Wind Powerful Makeup Fan Cute Small Fan with Base & Lanyard for Hand Held Desk Travel Beach Office, Pink

features: 💗【Up to 30H Working Time】💗Instead of common 2000mAh battery fan in market, our handheld fan is inbuilt with upgraded 4800mAh rechargeable battery, which has faster charging efficiency and longer duration time. The mini handheld fan will be full charged in 4.5H and continuously work for 7.5-30H (depending on the wind speed you choose). No matter you go out or meet the hurricane power outage, the small fan can provide coolness for you all day even longer. Trip partner!

💗【3 Settings Strong Wind】💗The portable fan adopts premium brushless motor, supporting the blade running at very high speed to produce strong wind. Press the button on the handle repeatedly to change the mode: Low Speed (breeze) at 4500rpm, the wind speed is 1.8m/s; Medium Speed(cool wind) at 6000rpm, the speed is 2.6m/s; High Speed (strong wind) at 8000rpm, the speed is 3.6m/s. In outdoor activities, the little fan will cool you down in few seconds, no need wait.

💗【Portable Pocket Fan】💗Smaller than a cellphone, the eyelash fan is only 2.5*1.9*6.2 inch in dimension, this compact size is ideal for your pocket/ cosmetic bag and backpack, without take much space to storage. Enjoy the airflow while traveling, exercising, waiting in line or applying makeup, especially for hot flashes and lash extensions. Modern appearance with exquisite workmanship, Coohea mini fan is a nice gift for girl, friend, colleague, workmate, family.

💗【Battery & USB Type-C Powered for Indoor Outdoor】💗Comes with 19.7inch USB cable, the rechargeable portable fan can work with and be recharged by 5V output adapter, power bank, laptop and other device that has a USB Type-C port, which suitable for indoor use like office work, school study etc. You also can take the battery operated fan to various outdoor occasions like rainforest trips, outdoor soccer game, company beach party, family camping picnic etc.

💗【3-in-1 Applications】💗With the 13.8inch Lanyard, you can hang the travel fan on your neck wherever you go. Free your hands when you not use it and no worry about forgetting it. By the removable Base with non-slip pad, the USB fan can be used as a desk fan on the table while you are working or studying. Mini in size, versatile in applications.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Battery Capacity 4800mAh Charging Port USB Type-C Input Voltage 5V/ 2A Full Charging Time 4.5H Working Time 7.5-30H Dimension 2.5*1.9*6.2inch（L*W*H) Weight 6.4 oz Color Pink

Powerful Wind > The travel fan adopts strong brushless motor, which is powerful enough to keep the blades running at high speed stably to generate wind continuously. > Press the button on the handle to choose the speed you need: Low Speed-- 4800rpm-- 1.8m/sMedium Speed- 6000rpm-- 2.6m/sHigh Speed-- 8000rpm-- 3.6m/s USB Type-C Powered > Equipped with USB Type-C cable, the portable cooling fan is compatible with 5V output USB interface, such as socket, computer, charging bank, car charger, etc. > USB Type-C port has better charging efficiency that the fan will be full charged in 4.5H. 4800mAh Rechargeable Battery > The built-in upgraded 4800mAh battery will support the mini fan portable working 7.5-30 hours duration base on the different wind speed you choose: Low Speed: 30HMedium Speed: 14HHigh Speed: 7.5H

Safe Gap The fan cover gap is less than 6mm which helps prevent kid's finger entering the fan when there is no adults. Safe design for daily life use. Smooth Handle Premium material combines with ergonomics design, the hand held fan is easy and comfortable for grip. Portable Lanyard With the 13.8inch neck string, you can hang the little fan around your neck when not use and get your hands free. No-Slip Base The detachable base has a non-slip pad, which helps increase friction for a firmer placement on the desktop.

This makeup fan is only 2.5*1.9*6.2 inch in size that it fits easily in a bag or pocket.Pink color with cute appearance, the eyelash fan will be a nice gift for girls, women, classmates, workmates and so on.

Coohea small portable fan not only can be used as a handheld fan, but also as a table fan. It will bring cooling wind for you whether you are traveling, commuting, shopping, camping, office, or attending outdoor activities like music festivals\ football game\ park walking etc. It will accompany you through the hot summer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A small fan with a lot of cooling power. Generally, the low setting is adequate, but two higher settings give you all the cooling you'll ever need. Battery charge lasts a long time. Good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 3 speeds! USB chargeable and long life!I worked the NHRA NW Nationals on one of the hottest days in the Seattle Area. I sat in the sun all day - I mean there was no shade and the area right across from me became the defacto smoking area. Not only did this little fan keep me cool - it also kept me from smelling all the smoke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need a slight change
reviews.reviewText: This fan works really really well. It will come in handy for concerts and theme parks. The only thing I would say is that the button is very poorly placed so it is easy for it to accidentally be turned on. But this is the perfect portable size for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had bought the 4800mAh fan for my quince ( 15th b-day ) party and absolutely loved it. The battery lasted all day from 12pm to 3am. The wind power was great it has three settings that have great speeds, my party was outside in a ranch therefore in was about 90 degrees and had kept me and my friends cool throughout the party. It is a very comfortable item to hold and carry around. This fan is a really great item to invest in. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for drying skin products
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to dry my face between my skin product layers. Works perfect. I use the highest setting and it dries quick. Happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved this item. Used it for the Beyoncé concert. It lasted for hours and cooled me down great. It was small for my purse and I love the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as expected
reviews.reviewText: I will purchase again. This fan is convenient and worked how I needed it to in DR.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! It works.
reviews.reviewText: This little fan is the best one I have had - and I always carry a fan. It is small, has a cage to cover the blades, and has adjustable speeds. It is rechargeable so no surprise battery leaks. It arrived ahead of schedule too. Definitely recommend.
